## 1.1) Study organisation

### Q1)

```{r}
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(vroom)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(knitr)
library(readr)
here::i_am("grades-eval.Rproj")
```

```{r}
#|eval: false
courses <- read.csv(here("subject-8","courses.csv"))
```

### Q2)

```{r}
courses_renamed <- courses |>
  rename(
    course = course,
    identifier = course_id,
    module = module,
    number_of_exams = nb_grades
  ) |>
  arrange(course)

kable(courses_renamed)
```
